attributes.action: Introduce legislation to ban both men and women from going topless in public places, except where appropriate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's never pleasant to see a sweaty man with no shirt on next to you in the supermarket queue.  Unless it is on the beach, swimming pool or other similar location, both sexes should stay covered up, thereby preserving the dignity of all concerned.
